backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing video platform functionality including user profiles, video upload/management, likes, comments, subscriptions, playlists, reports, and admin controls with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (authentication, profiles, video upload/streaming, likes, comments, subscriptions, playlists, search, admin) to their corresponding files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, React Query hooks, UI components (video player, comments, likes, reports), and pages (home, video, upload, profile, admin) with their key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space, including sidebar, chart, and UI component tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the StreamHub application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (home, video, upload, profile, category, search, trending, history, playlist, admin), ThemeProvider, Layout wrapper, and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/CategoryNav.tsx: Navigation component rendering a list of predefined video categories (Gaming, Music, Education, etc.) as type-safe router links.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Comment interface component with textarea for adding comments, list display with author avatars and timestamps, and delete functionality for comment authors with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component with sticky header, search bar, sidebar navigation, and category filtering. Includes mobile responsive menu and authentication-aware navigation links.
frontend/src/components/LikeButton.tsx: Button component for liking videos with optimistic UI updates, authentication checks, and duplicate like prevention.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication toggle button that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
Admin interface displaying reported videos with report details and actions to remove videos or dismiss reports.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile creation with username, email, bio, and profile picture upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/ReportModal.tsx: Dialog component for reporting videos with predefined reason selection and optional additional details textarea.
frontend/src/components/ReportVideoButto: Button that opens the report modal for non-owner users, with authentication checks and duplicate report prevention.
Channel subscription button with authentication checks and duplicate subscription handling, hidden for own channels.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Thumbnail card component displaying video metadata (title, description, views, category) with hover effects and navigation link.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: HTML5 video player component with controls, poster image, and automatic reload on video URL changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance for backend communication, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, videos (CRUD, trending, search, categories), likes, comments, subscriptions, reports, and admin functions with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a dark-themed design system including colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements using oklch color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page displaying platform statistics (users, videos, reports) with tabs for moderation queue and user management, protected by admin role check.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays videos filtered by category from URL params, showing a grid of video cards with loading skeletons and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Watch history page that requires authentication and currently shows a placeholder for upcoming watch history feature.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page featuring a hero banner and grid of trending videos with loading states and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/PlaylistPage.tsx: Playlist detail page that requires authentication and currently shows a placeholder for upcoming playlist feature.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user profile page with avatar, bio, video count, and subscriber count, showing either an edit button for own profile or a subscribe button for others. Includes tabs for videos and playlists, with a grid of the user's uploaded videos.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Renders search results page that displays videos matching a search query from URL parameters. Shows loading skeletons during fetch and empty states for no query or no results.
frontend/src/pages/TrendingPage.tsx: Displays trending videos in a grid with numbered badges indicating rank. Shows loading skeletons while fetching and an empty state if no videos exist.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Provides a form for authenticated users to upload videos with title, description, category, video file (MP4/MOV), and optional thumbnail. Handles file validation, upload progress tracking, and navigation to the video page after successful upload.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPage.tsx: Displays a video player page with video details, like/share/report buttons, subscribe button, description, comment section, and related videos sidebar. Shows owner-specific controls when the current user owns the video.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support. Includes functions to get, store, retrieve, and clear parameters from URL and session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, custom animations, font families, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project configuration defining a modern video streaming platform with comprehensive features including user management, video upload/streaming, social features, search, playlists, admin dashboard, live streaming, AI features, and monetization. Includes architectural notes for scalable microservices infrastructure with CDN integration, cloud hosting, and distributed caching.
